description: Control Terminal application through AppleScript with full class hierarchy support
long_description: This enhanced extension allows you to control Terminal through its official AppleScript API with complete class hierarchy support. Property getters and setters now include the full object path for precise targeting. Includes static data functions for exploring the application's complete class structure and command mappings.

tools.name: get_name_of_application
tools.description: Get The name of the application.

tools.name: get_frontmost_of_application
tools.description: Get Is this the active application?

tools.description: Get Its location on disk, if it has one. of document

tools.description: Close a window.

tools.name: quit
tools.description: Quit the application.

tools.name: count_document
tools.description: Return the number of elements of a particular class within a document.

tools.name: count_tab_of_window
tools.description: Return the number of elements of a particular class within a tab of window.

tools.name: count_settings_set
tools.description: Return the number of elements of a particular class within a settings set.

tools.name: count_window
tools.description: Return the number of elements of a particular class within a window.

tools.name: delete
tools.description: Delete an object.

tools.name: duplicate
tools.description: Copy object(s) and put the copies at a new location.

tools.description: Verify if an object exists.
